title: Notice out of all the Juggernauts how Mordekaisers the weakest?
body:
I mean literally every other juggernaut is at least SOMEWHAT viable,

{{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:48}} 

are all at least decent juggernauts while {{champion:82}}  just seems....well.....

I mean primarily because most tank items are AD + Armor and/HP while very few are AP + Armor {{item:3050}} {{item:3157}} being the only 2,

a large percentage of AP tank items are either AP + MR or AP + HP

now yes Mordekaiser uses HP to use abilities but the problem is is that HP on it's own isn't enough, as he doesn't have the damage to use without sacrificing HP, if anything should be done to make Mordekaiser viable again, he really should get armor/MR scaling due to the lack of much defense while trying to build damage.

How many pocket yoricks are there? Being picked even once puts him ahead of a lot of champions.

It doesn't put him ahead of anyone more than he already was.


It's like when lucian fell to bottom tier and doublelift picked him anyways. he stayed bottom tier.

i thought that was only fly quest, and they pretty much only win based off of cheese now, considering the fact clg beat them 2 to 0(Im a big fan of clg, but we can't even do that to Tl or NV) Olaf is currently a pretty strong pick, with trundle also being occassionally used as a counter to tanks top. I would even argue that mundo is more viable in competitive since he atleast is picked on a team that is relatively good (Afreeka)

I wouldn't say Morde is the weakest Juggernaut. He does do pretty well, compared to most of the Juggernauts. He's also one of the few who are competitively viable. If I had to pick the weakest Juggernauts, it would be either Nasus or Yorick. Nasus for his reliance on time, and Yorick for his weakness anywhere that doesn't have 3-4 graves.

Sure, winrate isn't everything, but lolalytics has ADC Morde (they list it as support, but they only recently were able to differentiate Ziggs bot from Ziggs support) at a 51% winrate, which is way higher than the 48% most juggs have.
